fieldToMatch.description: The part of a web request that you want AWS WAF to inspect. See `field_to_match` below for details.

regexString.description: String representing the regular expression. Minimum of `1` and maximum of `512` characters.

textTransformations.description: Text transformations eliminate some of the unusual formatting that attackers use in web requests in an effort to bypass detection. At least one transformation is required. See `text_transformation` below for details.
